name: YouGov-Imperial COVID-19 Behavior Tracker
title: YouGov-Imperial COVID-19 Behavior Tracker
description:
YouGov has partnered with the Institute of Global Health Innovation (IGHI) at Imperial College London to gather global insights on people’s behaviors in response to COVID-19. The research will cover 29 countries, interviewing around 21,000 people each week.

It is designed to provide behavioral analysis on how different populations are responding to the pandemic, helping public health bodies in their efforts to limit the impact of the disease. Anonymized respondent level data will be available for all public health and academic institutions globally.

The questions in the survey, led by IGHI, cover data on testing, symptoms, self-isolating in response to symptoms and the ability and willingness to self-isolate if needed. It also looks at behaviors, including going outdoors, working outside the home, contact with others, handwashing and the extent of compliance with 20 common preventative measures.

sources.name: Imperial College London YouGov Covid 19 Behaviour Tracker Data Hub – Last updated 9 September 2021
sources.additionalInfo:
YouGov has partnered with the Institute of Global Health Innovation (IGHI) at Imperial College London to gather global insights on people’s behaviors in response to COVID-19. The research will cover 29 countries, interviewing around 21,000 people each week.

It is designed to provide behavioral analysis on how different populations are responding to the pandemic, helping public health bodies in their efforts to limit the impact of the disease. Anonymized respondent level data will be available for all public health and academic institutions globally.

The questions in the survey, led by IGHI, cover data on testing, symptoms, self-isolating in response to symptoms and the ability and willingness to self-isolate if needed. It also looks at behaviors, including going outdoors, working outside the home, contact with others, handwashing and the extent of compliance with 20 common preventative measures.
sources.dataPublisherSource: Imperial College London YouGov Covid 19 Behaviour Tracker Data Hub

fields.name: household_members_contact
fields.description: Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of people from own household that respondents came into physical contact with (within 2m/6ft)", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: people_contact_outside_household
fields.description: Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of people from outside own household that respondents came into physical contact with (within 2m/6ft)", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: times_left_home_yesterday
fields.description: Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of times respondents left home yesterday", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: handwashing_yesterday
fields.description: Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Number of times respondents washed their hands or used hand sanitiser yesterday", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: willingness_isolate_if_symptoms
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who answered "Yes" to the question: "Thinking about the next 7 days, would you isolate yourself after feeling unwell or having any of the following new symptoms: a dry cough, fever, loss of sense of smell, loss of sense of taste, shortness of breath or difficulty breathing?"

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who are willing to isolate if they develop COVID-19 symptoms", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: difficult_to_isolate
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who answered "Very difficult" or "Somewhat difficult" to the question: "If you were advised to do so by a healthcare professional or public health authority, how easy or difficult would it be for you to self-isolate for 7 days?"

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents would have difficulty self-isolating for 7 days", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: willingness_isolate_if_advised
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who answered "Very willing" or "Somewhat willing" to the question: "If you were advised to do so by a healthcare professional or public health authority, to what extent are you willing or not to self-isolate for 7 days?"

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who are willing to isolate if advised by a healthcare professional or authority", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: mask_outside_home
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who answered "Always" or "Frequently" to the question: "Thinking about the last 7 days, how often have you worn a face mask outside your home (e.g. when on public transport, going to a supermarket, going to a main road) in order to protect yourself or others from COVID-19?"

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who wear a face mask", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who frequently wash their hands with soap and water", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.description:

fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who are scared of contracting COVID-19", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: covid_dangerous_to_me
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "COVID-19 is very dangerous for me." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 7 scale, ranging from "Disagree" (1) to "Agree" (7). We consider responses of 5 or above to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe COVID-19 is dangerous to them", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: likely_get_covid_future
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "It is likely that I will get COVID-19 in the future." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 7 scale, ranging from "Disagree" (1) to "Agree" (7). We consider responses of 5 or above to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe it is likely they will get COVID-19", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: mask_protect_me
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "Wearing a mask will protect me against COVID-19." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 7 scale, ranging from "Disagree" (1) to "Agree" (7). We consider responses of 5 or above to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe wearing a face mask will protect them from COVID-19", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.description:

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe wearing a face mask will protect others from COVID-19", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: mask_not_possible
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "Wearing a mask to protect me against COVID-19 is not possible for me." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 7 scale, ranging from "Disagree" (1) to "Agree" (7). We consider responses of 5 or above to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe wearing a face mask is not possible for them", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "I feel it is important to carry out activities which will improve my health." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 7 scale, ranging from "Disagree" (1) to "Agree" (7). We consider responses of 5 or above to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe it is important to carry out activities which will improve their health", "unit": "%", "zeroDay": "2020-01-21", "shortUnit": "%", "tolerance": 30, "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.description:

fields.name: covid_vaccine_important_health
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who answered "Very important" or "Moderately important" to the question: "How important do you think getting a COVID-19 vaccine is for your health?"

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe that getting a COVID-19 vaccine is important for their health", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: covid_vaccine_important_health__num_responses
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Monthly number of survey respondents for \"Share of respondents who believe that getting a COVID-19 vaccine is important for their health\"", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: covid_vaccine_will_prevent_transmission
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "A vaccine will completely prevent those who receive it from transmitting COVID-19 to others." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 5 scale, ranging from "Strongly agree" (1) to "Strongly disagree" (5). We consider responses of 1 or 2 to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe a vaccine will completely prevent recipients from transmitting COVID-19 to others", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: covid_vaccine_will_prevent_transmission__num_responses
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Monthly number of survey respondents for \"Share of respondents who believe a vaccine will completely prevent recipients from transmitting COVID-19 to others\"", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: covid_vaccine_will_protect_health
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "A vaccine will completely protect those who receive it from possible health effects of COVID-19." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 5 scale, ranging from "Strongly agree" (1) to "Strongly disagree" (5). We consider responses of 1 or 2 to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe a vaccine will completely protect recipients from the possible health effects of COVID-19", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: covid_vaccine_will_protect_health__num_responses
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Monthly number of survey respondents for \"Share of respondents who believe a vaccine will completely protect recipients from the possible health effects of COVID-19\"", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: govt_will_provide_effective_covid_vaccine
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "I believe government health authorities in my country will provide me with an effective COVID-19 vaccine." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 5 scale, ranging from "Strongly agree" (1) to "Strongly disagree" (5). We consider responses of 1 or 2 to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who believe government health authorities will provide them with an effective COVID-19 vaccine", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: trust_covid_vaccines
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who answered "Very much" or "Moderately" to the question: "How much do you trust COVID-19 vaccines?"

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who trust COVID-19 vaccines", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: willingness_covid_vaccinate_this_week
fields.description:
Monthly share of unvaccinated survey respondents who agree with the statement: "If a COVID-19 vaccine were made available to me this week, I would definitely get it." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 5 scale, ranging from "Strongly agree" (1) to "Strongly disagree" (5). We consider responses of 1 or 2 to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of unvaccinated respondents who would get a COVID-19 vaccine if it was available to them this week", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: willingness_covid_vaccinate_this_week__num_responses

fields.name: willingness_isolate_if_symptoms__num_responses
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Monthly number of survey respondents for \"Share of respondents who are willing to isolate if they develop COVID-19 symptoms\"", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true}

fields.name: worried_covid_vaccine_side_effects
fields.description:
Monthly share of survey respondents who agree with the statement: "I am worried about potential side effects of a COVID-19 vaccine." Respondents were presented with a 1 to 5 scale, ranging from "Strongly agree" (1) to "Strongly disagree" (5). We consider responses of 1 or 2 to be in agreement with the statement.

Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who are worried about potential side effects of a COVID-19 vaccine", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}

fields.name: worried_covid_vaccine_side_effects__num_responses
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Monthly number of survey respondents for \"Share of respondents who are worried about potential side effects of a COVID-19 vaccine\"", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true}

fields.description: Share of respondents who have either received at least one dose of a COVID-19 vaccine or who would get a COVID-19 vaccine if it was available to them this week.
fields.owidDisplaySettings: {"name": "Share of respondents who are willing to get vaccinated or are already vaccinated", "unit": "%", "shortUnit": "%", "yearIsDay": true, "includeInTable": true, "numDecimalPlaces": 1}
